        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getGroupedXValues(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> peaks,
                                                                 double distancePeaks)
        Function that takes a list of Double values and groups the values in range of .
        Parameters:
        peaks - List of doubles, sorted ASC.
        distancePeaks - Double distance in which peaks are grouped.
        Returns:
        List of doubles which are grouped.

      • getDoubleArrayFindMax

        public static android.util.Pair<java.util.List<double[]>,java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> getDoubleArrayFindMax(java.util.List<SensorEntity> sensorEntityList,
                                                                                                                 java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Long>> xyValues)
        Use this function to parse a list of x and y values for sensor data streams into double[] to pass it to a peak detection working on double[]. Additionally, the function finds the max Y value for each sensor. This is used to calculate the threshold for a peak detection.
        Parameters:
        sensorEntityList - List of SensorEntities from which the are from.
        xyValues - List of Lists containing x and y values ordered by their sensor id.
        Returns:
        A Pair containing a list of double values and the found max y value.
